Colorkit

A Compass extension for building color schemes in Sass.

Home Color Library Color Scheme Use

Yellow-Greens

Yellow-Green Tint Stack
Color Variable Hex Code
$yellow-green #7FBF00
$yellow-green--tint-1 #92C826
$yellow-green--tint-2 #A5D24C
$yellow-green--tint-3 #B8DB72
$yellow-green--tint-4 #CBE599
$yellow-green--tint-5 #DFEFBF
$yellow-green--tint-6 #F2F8E5
Yellow-Green Tone Stack
Color Variable Hex Code
$yellow-green #7FBF00
$yellow-green--tone-1 #7FB513
$yellow-green--tone-2 #7FAC26
$yellow-green--tone-3 #7FA239
$yellow-green--tone-4 #7F994C
$yellow-green--tone-5 #7F8F60
$yellow-green--tone-6 #7F8673
Yellow-Green Shade Stack
Color Variable Hex Code
$yellow-green #7FBF00
$yellow-green--shade-1 #6BA200
$yellow-green--shade-2 #588500
$yellow-green--shade-3 #456900
$yellow-green--shade-4 #324C00
$yellow-green--shade-5 #1F2F00
$yellow-green--shade-6 #1F2F00
